MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML2 postcode area of Wishaw, affecting properties in Steel Street and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5.11pm. Our engineers have arrived York substation and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8.15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5.41pm on Sunday 27 December 2020.
